query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: Staged gate reviewing process for concerted innovation portfolio coordination
result.description:
Document providing a structured process to review progress in a portfolio of relevant programmes and initiatives, as a key element to the coordination mechanism for transport infrastructure innovation development and implementation.
Deliverable refers to Task 2.1.

result.title: Functional and technical specification for the OptiYard simulation environment
result.description: This deliverable comprises three parts. The first part will address the functional specification, setting out all relevant processes required for yard simulation. The second part will set out the formalised technical specification for implementation of simulation in the specified simulation environment, whilst the final part will specify the processes and systems for data management during simulation.

result.title: Information system testing plan with test cases and scenarios and test results
result.description: A report on Information system testing plan with test cases and scenarios. This deliverable consist of defining a testing plan with test cases for testing the integration of the information system with Serbian and Bulgarian railway company information system, as well as the integration with the Serbian and Bulgarian marshalling yards automation systems.

result.title: Detailed Specification of the Infrastructure Platform v3
result.description: This report will detail the last design of the solutions to be implemented related to the hybrid orchestration, the data and VMs/jobs management, the profiling component, the SLA management, the monitoring infrastructure and the accounting component. It will include a detailed architecture with the features added in the last version and the update of the former ones, with the necessary UML diagrams.

result.title: EUXDAT Pilots Implementation v2
result.description:
This deliverable represents the second release of the three pilots: optimizing resources management in farms, energy efficiency and 3D farming. They are done by using the EUXDAT e-Infrastructure v2 and in line to its detailed definition.
It also includes a report detailing the implementation, configuration steps and lessons learnt and other feedback about EUXDAT. Such report contains information about the eInfrastructure v2 components qualification, determining the TRL which corresponds to each one and the missing actions for those not reaching TRL8.

result.title: Recommendations for improved traffic management, improved information and communication channels across parties involved
result.description: This deliverable will secure that the bridge between the current state of play and new development concepts has been triggered. Specifically, it will provide an understanding and draft recommendations of how we can go beyond the current operation patterns for rail freight yard and for network management when the focus on those time-dependent activities and the importance of efficient data and information management mechanism in place. These recommendations will be further exploited in WP3, WP4 and WP5.
